name: Rock
description: Well, that's just some rock. Not sure what you want to do with it.

name: Copper
description: Copper is not a very good weapon material, but it's cheap, and you've got to start with something. Right ?

name: Iron
description: Iron is the most used material amongst blacksmiths. It's not very expensive, and you can craft great weapons from it !

name: Tin
description: Tin is not a very good material on its own. But it has some use.

name: Aluminum
description: Aluminum is a very light, but very resistant metal if properly melted !

name: Titanium
description: Titanium is one of the most solid metals on this planet. It can only melt at very high temperatures.

name: Diamond
description: Diamond is the most solid thing that exists. Used properly, it can give a weapon some great strength !
